LanguageData.KB_PocketDimension_ToggleSync_Descriptio: Toggle syncing item storage filters between the box and its corresponding exit.
LanguageData.KB_PocketDimension_Transport_Description: Select specific items to carry inside.
LanguageData.KB_MustPlaceNextToDimensionalHopperAccep: Must be placed next to a pocket dimension entrance.
LanguageData.KB_PocketDimensionDestroyedLetterText: A dimensional containment field has been breached. Its contents are lost.
LanguageData.KB_PocketDimensionLostLetterText: The entrance to a dimensional containment box has been lost along with its contents.
LanguageData.KB_ViewExitDescription: Go to the contained pocket dimension.
LanguageData.KB_ViewEntranceDescription: Go to the entrance to this pocket dimension.
LanguageData.KB_RenamePocketDimensionMessage: This pocket dimension is now called {0}.
LanguageData.KB_DecreasePocketDimensionSizeDescriptio: Decrease the size of the pocket dimension.
LanguageData.KB_IncreasePocketDimensionSizeDescriptio: Increase the size of the pocket dimension.
LanguageData.KB_PocketDimensionCreated: A pocket dimension has been successfully created!
